data.eml:eml: A nomenclatural note in Cimicidae (Hemiptera) from South America

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Di, Osvaldo R., Turienzo, Paola N. (2008): A nomenclatural note in Cimicidae (Hemiptera) from South America. Zootaxa 1730: 65-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.181295
